topology_name: Z5 Up - 多层树形结构

config.topology_name: Z5 Up - 多层树形结构
config.description: Z5 Up - 多层树形结构 - uplink

tor_circuit_mapping.description: 3-hop Tor circuit mapped to SAGIN nodes

tc_commands: sudo tc qdisc del dev lo root 2>/dev/null || true
sudo tc qdisc add dev lo root netem delay 2.71ms 0.68ms distribution normal rate 102.76mbit loss 5.00%
